title: FRUIT PARTY
description: Merge and grow your fruits to score big in Fruit Party - the ultimate basket-dropping challenge! Fruit Party is an addictive 2D game where you drop fruits into a basket and merge identical ones to create bigger, juicier fruits. Every successful merge increases your score and grants coins for each unseen upgrade. But watch out! As your basket fills up, the challenge intensifies, and if your fruits cross the top line, itâ€™s game over. Use power-ups like a free upgrade or a basket shake to keep the party going and maximize your score. So start dropping, merging, and growing your fruit empire in Fruit Party!
